raw_body: PERERA MAGDA (fondly known as BUBBY) – Beloved wife of the late Mr. Samson Perera,​ loving mother of Santha and Carmeline,​ Christine and the late Hamiltus Seneviratne,​ Lali and Ravinath Goonesekera,​ Samagi and Hirantha Perera,​ Polly and Bevan Ranasinghe,​ cherished grandmother of Shahane and Nadee,​ Shalindra and Natasha,​ Hashane and Hasna,​ Roshaini and Chammara,​ Ranesha and Rakitha,​ Rehan,​ Himasha,​ Shanelle,​ Hashindra and Rushenka,​ Shana,​ Bimesh and Octavia Shalon and Shiki,​ great-grandmother of Shanique,​ Natanya Sachiel,​ Nathanyel Noah,​ Naadya,​ Chavith,​ Ruvith,​ Ranaaya,​ Ranik,​ Radhik and Aliza. Cortege will leave residence at 12,​ Kalyani Mawatha,​ Wattala on Tuesday,​ 9th April 2024,​ at 3.00 p.m. for a service and burial at St. Anne’s Church,​ Wattala.024431
